bibl.title: Networks in the Hellenistic World According to the Pottery in the Eastern Mediterranean and beyond

bibl.seg: Andrea M. Berlin, Something Old, Something New: Native Cultures under Ptolemaic Rule.

Nina Fenn & Christiane Römer-Strehl (edd.), Networks in the Hellenistic World According to the Pottery in the Eastern Mediterranean and beyond = BAR International Series. 2539 (Oxford, 2013) pp. 229-237, 8 figg.
